name: Catapult Sports
description: World Leader in Elite Athlete Tracking
overview:
Catapult Sports is the world leader in tracking, measuring and improving elite athlete performance.

We produce technology, both wearable hardware and software analytics, that measures and enhances every aspect elite athlete performance.

With hundreds of world-class clients across the US, Europe, and the Asia-Pacific, Catapult’s technology can measure every physical indicator of an athlete’s movement – from distance to speed, intensity to exertion. These clients include teams in the NFL, NBA, EPL, Div 1 Colleges, National and Olympic teams, and many more.

Most recently Catapult has become the world’s first company to deploy a portable and fully commercialised LPS (“indoor GPS”) solution, and has created Smart Balls comprising intelligent embedded hardware in sports balls such as those used in AFL, Rugby, Rugby League, and even NFL.
